headline: Assessing Disney (DIS) Stock’s Valuation After Its Recent Momentum Rebound
summary: Why Walt Disney Stock Is Back on Investors Radar Walt Disney (DIS) has quietly outperformed the broader market over the past month, and that recent climb comes after a choppy few months that left many investors second guessing the stock. See our latest analysis for Walt Disney. Those gains sit against a flatter backdrop, with the 1 year total shareholder return at 1.73 percent. However, the recent 1 month share price return of 6.22 percent hints that momentum is starting to rebuild as...
